name: project3-poseidon2-circom-windows
description: A Windows-friendly Circom implementation of the Poseidon2 hash function.

scripts.setup: npx snarkjs groth16 setup build/main.r1cs build/pot12_final.ptau build/main_0000.zkey && npx snarkjs zkey contribute build/main_0000.zkey build/main_final.zkey -v -e="some random text" && npx snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/main_final.zkey build/verification_key.json
scripts.witness: npx snarkjs wtns calculate build/main_js/main.wasm input.json build/witness.wtns
scripts.prove: npx snarkjs groth16 prove build/main_final.zkey build/witness.wtns build/proof.json build/public.json
scripts.verify: npx snarkjs groth16 verify build/verification_key.json build/public.json build/proof.json
